HOME.TITLE: PiXelDa
HOME.SUBTITLE: AI-Powered Game Asset Generation Platform

IMAGE_GENERATION.TITLE: Image Generation
IMAGE_GENERATION.CHARACTER_DESCRIPTION_PLACEHOLDER: Describe the character (e.g., young woman, elderly man, fantasy creature...)
IMAGE_GENERATION.NEGATIVE_PROMPT_PLACEHOLDER: What to avoid (e.g., blurry, ugly, deformed...)
IMAGE_GENERATION.GENERATING_MESSAGE: This may take a few moments
IMAGE_GENERATION.PREVIEW_PLACEHOLDER: Your generated image will appear here
IMAGE_GENERATION.PREVIEW_MESSAGE: Fill out the form and click "Generate Image"
IMAGE_GENERATION.PROMPT_TEMPLATE: A high-resolution pixel-art game asset depicting {{description}}, against a solid green screen background
IMAGE_GENERATION.IMAGE_URL_PLACEHOLDER: Enter URL of the image you want to edit
IMAGE_GENERATION.EDIT_PROMPT_PLACEHOLDER: Describe how you want to modify the image (e.g., change hairstyle, add accessories, change background...)

ANIMATION_GENERATION.TITLE: üé¨ Animation Generation
ANIMATION_GENERATION.IMAGE_URL_PLACEHOLDER: Enter image URL for animation base
ANIMATION_GENERATION.ANIMATION_PROMPT_PLACEHOLDER: Describe the animation you want to generate
ANIMATION_GENERATION.NEGATIVE_PROMPT_PLACEHOLDER: What to avoid in the animation
ANIMATION_GENERATION.GENERATING_MESSAGE: This may take a few moments
ANIMATION_GENERATION.PREVIEW_PLACEHOLDER: Your generated animation will appear here
ANIMATION_GENERATION.PREVIEW_MESSAGE: Fill out the form and click "Generate Animation"

HISTORY.TITLE: Generation History
HISTORY.CLEAR_ALL_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to clear all generation history? This action cannot be undone.
HISTORY.EMPTY_STATE: No generations found. Start creating some pixel art!

SPRITE_SHEET.TITLE: üé® Sprite Sheet Generation
SPRITE_SHEET.VIDEO_URL_PLACEHOLDER: Enter video URL to split into frames
SPRITE_SHEET.FRAME_COUNT_LABEL_DESC: Total number of frames to extract evenly distributed
SPRITE_SHEET.SPLITTING_MESSAGE: This may take a few moments
SPRITE_SHEET.FRAMES_PLACEHOLDER: Your extracted frames will appear here
SPRITE_SHEET.FRAMES_PLACEHOLDER_DESC: Enter a video URL and click "Split Video"
SPRITE_SHEET.SELECT_FRAMES_PREVIEW: Please select frames to preview animation
SPRITE_SHEET.SELECT_FRAMES_MESSAGE: Please select frames to preview animation
SPRITE_SHEET.SPRITE_SHEET_NAME_PLACEHOLDER: Enter name for your sprite sheet
SPRITE_SHEET.REMOVE_BACKGROUND_DESC: Uses AI to remove solid backgrounds from all selected frames
SPRITE_SHEET.FROM_TIME_LATER: From time cannot be later than to time
SPRITE_SHEET.TO_TIME_EARLIER: To time cannot be earlier than from time
SPRITE_SHEET.FIX_TIME_ERRORS: Please fix the time input errors before proceeding
SPRITE_SHEET.NO_FRAMES_GENERATED: No frames were generated from the video
SPRITE_SHEET.SELECT_AT_LEAST_ONE: Please select at least one frame to download
SPRITE_SHEET.SELECT_AT_LEAST_ONE_PREVIEW: Please select at least one frame to preview
SPRITE_SHEET.ERROR_FROM_TIME_LATER: From time cannot be later than to time
SPRITE_SHEET.ERROR_TO_TIME_EARLIER: To time cannot be earlier than from time
SPRITE_SHEET.ERROR_FIX_TIME_INPUTS: Please fix the time input errors before proceeding
SPRITE_SHEET.ERROR_NO_FRAMES_GENERATED: No frames were generated from the video
SPRITE_SHEET.ERROR_NO_FRAMES_SELECTED: Please select at least one frame to download
SPRITE_SHEET.ERROR_NO_FRAMES_PREVIEW: Please select at least one frame to preview
